references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion and laying the groundwork for many subsequent advances in text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduced Stable Diffusion, a highly influential model that significantly advanced the state of the art in text-to-image generation, and is directly used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduced Imagen, another highly impactful text-to-image diffusion model that sets a new benchmark for image quality and deep language integration.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduced CLIP, a powerful model for aligning image and text embeddings that is crucial for many text-to-image models and is directly referenced in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross-attention control
references.reason: This work introduced Prompt-to-Prompt, a highly effective method for image editing using diffusion models, which shares the goal of controlling image generation through text prompts, as does the current paper.
